import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import datetime
source.15de489d:
data_br['date'] = pd.to_datetime(data_br['date'])
data_br.rename(columns={'date':'ds','total_vaccinations':'y'}, inplace=True)

data_aus['date'] = pd.to_datetime(data_aus['date'])
data_aus.rename(columns={'date':'ds','total_vaccinations':'y'}, inplace=True)
source.8647f153:
import plotly
import plotly.graph_objs as go
source.1e80fbfe:
trace_br = [go.Scatter(x=data_br['ds'], y=data_br['y'])]

layout_br = go.Layout(title='Number of vaccinated citizens - Brazil',
                   yaxis={'title':'Total'},
                   xaxis={'title':'Date'})

trace_aus = [go.Scatter(x=data_aus['ds'], y=data_aus['y'])]

layout_aus = go.Layout(title='Number of vaccinated citizens - Australia',
                   yaxis={'title':'Total'},
                   xaxis={'title':'Date'})

from statsmodels.tsa.seasonal import seasonal_decompose

source.5fafabb3:

title_aus = 'Autocorrelation Australia'

paus = plot_acf(x_aus, title=title_aus)
